org.jfugue

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jfugue.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Prepares a pattern to be turned into music by the Renderer. This class also handles saving the sequence derived from a pattern as a MIDI file.
    See Also:
    MidiRenderer, Pattern
